name: boxed::convert::<impl core::convert::TryFrom<boxed::Box<[T]>> for boxed::Box<[T; N]>>::try_from

boxed::convert::boxed_slice_as_array_unc.doc:
Casts a boxed slice to a boxed array.

 # Safety

 `boxed_slice.len()` must be exactly `N`.

boxed::Box: Unknown([Field(0, Ty { id: 617, kind: RigidTy(Adt(AdtDef(DefId { id: 2645, name: "core::ptr::Unique" }), GenericArgs([Type(Ty { id: 615, kind: RigidTy(Slice(Ty { id: 10, kind: Param(ParamTy { index: 0, name: "T" }) })) })]))) }), Field(0, Ty { id: 351, kind: RigidTy(Adt(AdtDef(DefId { id: 2619, name: "core::ptr::NonNull" }), GenericArgs([Type(Ty { id: 615, kind: RigidTy(Slice(Ty { id: 10, kind: Param(ParamTy { index: 0, name: "T" }) })) })]))) })])

doc:
Attempts to convert a `Box<[T]>` into a `Box<[T; N]>`.

 The conversion occurs in-place and does not require a
 new memory allocation.

 # Errors

 Returns the old `Box<[T]>` in the `Err` variant if
 `boxed_slice.len()` does not equal `N`.
